column1: Smoque BBQ////The restaurant was super busy when I arrived
column2: but there were associates who were nice enough to anticipate your seating and dining needs that they actively reserve a table for you
column3: so that by the time you're done ordering your food
column6: and then ready to head out and enjoy the rest of the beautiful city! The process is so efficient that I don't know why other restaurants don't follow their method.
